name: CollectivePoint
description:
Cutting edge technology doesn't have to be so complicated. CollectivePoint is committed to Keeping Software Simple! We are equally committed to helping our clients to prosper, our employees to excel, and our community to flourish.
Offering Austin's best talent in the industry and absolute integrity. CollectivePoint utilizes the most advanced technologies, tools, processes, and products to maximize our clients' return on investment.
